Package controller

Class StaffController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.DatabaseController
      • controller.StaffController

  • public class StaffController
extends DatabaseController
    A controller to perform storing and retrieval of Staff to/from database. Also validates changes before committing any changes to database.
    Since:
    2017-11-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Amos

    • Constructor Detail

      • StaffController

        private StaffController​()
        Creates a new Staff Controller. Also initialize the list of staffs and read from database.

    • Method Detail

      • readDB

        protected void readDB​()
        Retrieve the staffs from database. The order is as follows: Staff Name, Mobile Number, Password, Email, StaffID These variables are parsed into the MovieGoer objects and stored when the MovieGoer Controller is initalized.
        Specified by:
        readDB in class DatabaseController

      • writeDB

        protected void writeDB​()
        Save the Staff model into database. Each line in the Staff.dat file is a booking object. The order is as follows: Staff Name, Mobile Number, Password, Email, StaffID These will be appended into the Staff.dat file in sequence.
        Specified by:
        writeDB in class DatabaseController

      • validateStaff

        public boolean validateStaff​(java.lang.String email,
                             java.lang.String password)
        Validate the account credentials of a staff.
        Parameters:
        email - Email of the staff.
        password - Password of the staff.
        Returns:
        true if the account exists and the credentials are correct. false otherwise.

      • getStaffByEmail

        public Staff getStaffByEmail​(java.lang.String email)
        Get the Staff object by its email address.
        Parameters:
        email - Email of the staff.
        Returns:
        Staff object it the account exists in database. null object otherwise.

      • getInstance

        public static StaffController getInstance​()
        Gets the channel reference of the StaffController. Creates the channel reference if it do not exists.
        Returns:
        Instance of the StaffController.

      • getStaffList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Staff> getStaffList​()
        Gets the list of staffs from database.
        Returns:
        List of Staffs.

      • printStaffList

        public void printStaffList​()
        Print out all the staff info.
